entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Sydenham
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:22 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.7°C

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Clearing this afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning then light late this afternoon. High plus 4. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Ice pellets. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Ice pellets or rain beginning near noon then changing to rain late in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h near noon. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023
